projects.title: MapLibre Map Demo
projects.description:
An interactive map application demo utilizing MapLibre with modern UI and diverse mapping features.

Key features:
• Marker Display - Add and manage markers at any location
• Route Display - Calculate and display routes between two points
• Map Styles - Switch between various map styles and 3D displays
• Current Location - Display user's current location on the map

Implemented with a modern glass-morphism UI design and responsive layout that adapts to all devices.

projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.description:
This portfolio site is built using Next.js 15 and the latest React features. It features refined styling with TailwindCSS and smooth animations powered by Framer Motion.

The site is fully responsive, providing optimal viewing across all devices from mobile to desktop. It also supports toggling between dark and light modes.

The project gallery includes a filtering system that allows visitors to narrow down projects based on technologies of interest.

Moving forward, I plan to add new projects while continuously incorporating the latest web technologies.

projects.title: Next.js Task Manager
projects.description:
A simple but effective task management application built with Next.js and MongoDB.

Key features:
• Task Creation - Add new tasks with title, description, and priority
• Task Management - Mark tasks as complete, edit details, or delete tasks
• Filtering - Filter tasks by completion status
• Responsive Design - Works seamlessly on mobile and desktop devices

Built to demonstrate proficiency with Next.js, MongoDB integration, and modern React patterns.
